# DEPARTMENT OF STATE TELEGRAM
**UNCLASSIFIED**

1. Dr. Franco will be arriving Baltimore (Friendship Airport) March 15 at 4:30 p.m. on Allegheny Flight 545.
2. Latest telegram from minister requested programming specifically as follows: Department of Labor, AFLO-CIO, Bolivia Desk in State Department, and the OAS. One part of the telegram was garbled and may have contained other programming ideas. Stedman
